reviewText: I wish Derek wouldn't have ruined the reputation of Cool Cat with his recent actions. The movies are pretty fun. :(
Derek Savage is himself a cyber bully. I cannot condone watching his films so as long as he bullies and threatens other people on YouTube and Twitter.
It is so bad it's funny, it's like James Nguyen and Derek Savage made a movie together.
My kids love this cool cat film and it addressed gun safety in a easy way. I highly recommend this film for all families.
